column6:
This issue, Marvel's newest hero, Debrii, joins the cast. Except...somebody forgot to tell the New Warriors! Can our heroes save a small town from a mysterious behemoth AND play nice with their prickly new teammate? All signs point to NO!!! ,2005,9


32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Randy Gentile | writer:Zeb Wells | penciller (cover):Skottie Young
